Package accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller

Class MessageController

java.lang.Object
accounts.bank.managing.thesis.bachelor.rastvdmy.controller.MessageController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/chat") public class MessageController extends Object
This class is responsible for handling message related requests. It provides endpoints for getting all messages, getting a message by id, getting messages by content, getting sorted messages, and sending a message.

  • Method Details

    • getMessages

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Message>> getMessages()
      This method is used to get all messages.
      Returns:
      A list of all messages.

    • getMessageById

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Message> getMessageById(@PathVariable("id") Long messageId)
      This method is used to get a message by id.
      Parameters:
      messageId - The id of the message.
      Returns:
      The message with the given id.

    • getMessagesByContent

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/search/{content}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Message>> getMessagesByContent(@PathVariable("content") String content)
      This method is used to get messages by content.
      Parameters:
      content - The content of the messages.
      Returns:
      A list of messages with the given content.

    • getSortedMessages

      @ResponseStatus(OK) @GetMapping(path="/{id}/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Message>> getSortedMessages(@PathVariable("id") Long userId, @RequestParam("sort") String sort, @RequestParam(value="order",defaultValue="asc") String order)
      This method is used to get sorted messages.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user.
      sort - The sort option.
      order - The order option.
      Returns:
      A list of sorted messages.

    • sendMessage

      @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping(path="/") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_MODERATOR\', \'ROLE_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Message> sendMessage(@RequestBody MessageRequest messageRequest)
      This method is used to send a message.
      Parameters:
      messageRequest - The request containing the sender id, receiver id, and content of the message.
      Returns:
      The sent message.
